chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Si, of course
aye aye, cap'n! i'm at the starting point now
Parece que hay una ramita más adelante que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre. ¿que sigue?
Continue forwardtilly9u see the parrot ver a la derecha de el azul y amarillo parrot  go over and a4ound the head 5illyou run into a bridge of boulders and cross there
alright, so i've spotted this vibrant parrot and walked around its head
now i see a bridge formed by three boulders. guess i just cross it, right?
Si
traversed the rock bridge, now there's an island with a frog
lo veo, what's next?
Stay a la derecha del frog go just slightly past it and turn back towards the way u came from head towards the alligator bridge
gotcha, so i stayed to the right of the frog, walked a bit and turned back, now i'm facing the crocodile bridge
cruzar este también?
Si
i've crossed the croc bridge, now i see that big old elephant again
what's next, cap'n?

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Yes
perfect! first, walk a few steps toward that wooden bench to your left
Cruza el sendero, pero espera, nuestra aventura no termina en el puesto de floristería. ¡Aún no estamos listos para las flores! ¿conmigo?
Ok I'm heading that way almost at the flowers
awesome! but hold up, just before you reach the florist stand, turn around completely. yes, a full 180
head back over the trail you just crossed. you should be going towards the white dog again
Ok
cool! now, see the branch south of where you're standing? cross over it and keep going south
Deberías estar caminando por el mapa. No olvides saludar al otro perro blanco cerca de la manta de picnic a cuadros en tu camino.
I'm a the picnic blanket now
you're doing great! now walk over the picnic blanket and keep going west until you come across the bowl of berries
careful, don't step on it!
Ok that was close what's nedt
awesome work! now, look for another wooden branch across the river
¿Listo para un pequeño acto de equilibrio? ¡Cruzalo, en dirección norte!
Ok
ok, you made it! now there's this green bush right? don't step on it
instead, circle it from the right until you finally reach that florist stand! are we good so far?
I'm there at the  Flower stand
¡lindo! ahora, gira a la izquierda desde la tribuna y camina debajo hasta llegar a un gran puente.
Ok I crossed the bride after going left
perfect! just past the bridge, do you see the two old folks on a bench? say hi from me, will ya?
Sure will do
thank you! now, step a few steps past them going south, right between that old couple and another wooden branch
¿Ves ese arbusto verde? ahí es donde te diriges
you're doing an excellent job! now go east, keeping the branch and the bush on your sides
you with me?
Y3p I think so
excellent! now, see if you can spot a little brown deer nearby
debería estar a sólo unos pasos de distancia

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Yep
cool, i'm by the tent now
fire, dog, and red mushroom in sight. which way, amigo?
Head forward towards the dog
awesome, i'm next to the dog now
¿que sigue?
Stay to the right of the dog go around its head and towards the campfire
got it, around the dog's head and
now i'm next to the fire. which way now?
Keep a little bit to the left of the campfire and go in between the campfire and the butt brush horse rub
Te tengo, estoy entre el fuego y la maleza ahora
Go slightly pass the red mushroom it will be on your left
passed the mushroom, it's on my left now
what's next?
Head towards the blue car go till you're almost in front of the blue car and stop
Muy bien, casi frente al auto azul ahora.
OK from there back track just a couple feet on that path
ok, i've backed up a bit
now what?
Now head back up the path towards the blue telescope in between the shrubs staying on the path
Muy bien, veo el telescopio azul entre los arbustos.
Go directly in between the blue telescope which will be on your right and the big green shrub which would be on your left
alright, between the telescope on my right and the shrub on my left now
They are slightly right and get back on the path
ok, i've veered right and i'm back on the path
Go forward a couple feet and then in between the 2 different rocks one will be on each side of you head towards that house
got it, i'm between the rocks now, heading toward the house. reached the house
*finalizado*. ¡Esto fue divertido, gracias!

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
Si
awesome! okay, first things first. you're by the three palm trees, yes? i need you to stroll under the first palm tree to your south-west
Una vez allí, gire bruscamente a la derecha y continúe hasta cruzar la segunda palmera.
Ok
now, dodge left before the third palm tree and head due south
keep it steady!
Ok what's next
you'll see a cute brown pup
bordee su izquierda, luego gire un poco a la izquierda y gire a la derecha para continuar hacia el sur. ¡Sigue moviéndote!
Ok I'm comingnupntona big rock
perfect, there should be a small rock on the other side
navigate between those and head straight to the water. you're doing great!
I'm at the edge of the water in between the 2 rocks
awesome! now you're gonna wanna get a bit wet
Métete en el agua y busca un gran cangrejo rojo.
Okay so I head towards the crab
yes! when you meet mr
crab, hang a right and follow the edge of that big rock, heading west. keep it up!
Okay in between a small rock and that big rock I just passed the crap
sweet, now look out for a third rock, a medium one
Verás un tiburón a lo lejos, ¡pero no te asustes!
Okay and buy the medium size rock
cool! alright, make a quick right around that medium rock and the shark
stick to your right!
OK I'm at the foot of the water by the shark
Genial, es hora de volver a tierra.
OK I'm on land
perfect, get between that medium rock and the tricolored ball and keep going north
Okay I'm coming up to a speaker
great! you should also see a red tent on your left
navegar un poco hacia el noroeste entre ellos. ¡Estás logrando esto!
Okay I'm in front of the red tint
nifty! now make a half circle around the tent and then head south
don't go all the way to the sea though!

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?
